Letters on several subjects with several other letters : to which is added by the publisher two letters, one to the Reverend Dr. Sherlock, Dean of St. Paul's, and the other to the Reverend Mr. Bentley : with other discourses / by Henry More ; publish'd by E. Elys. More, Henry, 1614-1687. Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
iv, 122 p.
Printed by W. Onely for John Everingham, London : 1694.
Imperfect: Advertisement pages torn with loss of print. Pages 114-end from the Huntington Library copy spliced at end. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
